arts.ttl: Andrej Kramarić shines as Hoffenheim continue perfect away form with win at St. Pauli
arts.sum: Hoffenheim bounced back from their defeat against Cologne last time out with a confident 3-0 win away to St. Pauli, with Andrej Kramarić providing a goal and an assist as they're still yet to taste defeat on the road this season. Hoffenheim came out firing after the break, with Kramarić forcing a save from Nikola Vasilj in the 52nd minute following excellent work from Bazoumana Toure .

arts.ttl: Kramarić extends scoring streak to help Hoffenheim beat St. Pauli
arts.sum: Three second-half goals helped Hoffenheim to a deserved victory away at St. Pauli.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: St. Pauli vs. TSG Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Here are the lineups for the last Bundesliga game of matchday 7.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. Hoffenheim preview: Can either side return to winning ways?
arts.sum: St. Pauli and Hoffenheim will both be desperate to return to winning ways when they lock horns at Millerntor-Stadion on Sunday.
